Text:
Excellent timing for sharing this! :)
The creator of the Wing Commander & Privateer games, Chris Roberts, has just recently finished a kickstarter (which gained him 7+ million dollars) in order for him to create a new Sci-fi flight-sim called "Star Citizen". 
Google it and drooool! :D
Thank you for this, but GOG just released this game with the expansion. Could you please upload it as well?
